file_content.text: You killed her. Just like that. She was evil and twisted, but... I did love her once.
We met years ago, on Alderaan. She was so dark and mysterious. And now she's dead.
Resist me, and it's more of the same for you.
Don't follow her lead.
Resist you? I want nothing more than to be home.
Your taste in women leaves something to be desired.
And good riddance.
Yes, well, I'm afraid I've always been a bit poor at such things.
I'm ready to go. It's to be carbonite for transport, then?
Goodbye, Altaca.
That's right.
Don't worry--it'll be painless.
It's easier, trust me.
Might want to shut your mouth while you still can.
Make sure you're ready.
I'm coming, Mother.
You can mourn her while you're in carbonite.
Save your tears. [Freeze him]
Oh, um, of course....
Yes, may I help you with something?
Darling, please don't speak to that... thing.
Darling, please don't speak to that filthy vagabond.
It's clearly not supposed to be here, and we shouldn't let ourselves look like we approve. Come, let us get a drink.
I know who you really are, Lord Dak-Ah.
Not so fast.
Then you know I am to be, um, feared and that you should not keep talking to me.
Not much of a family resemblance between you and your "brother."
You two are related?
We--we... we had, um, different mothers. Ya, ya, yes, that's right. We're only half-siblings... unless I'm misremembering.
Shut up, lady. Altaca, you're coming with me.
I don't have time for this.
To whom are you speaking? I've surely never heard of anyone named--
Stow it, darling. Just feel the smug knowledge radiate from her... we knew this might happen eventually.
Stow it, darling. Just feel the smug knowledge radiate from him... we knew this might happen eventually.
Yeah, only so long you can keep dating your brother before something goes wrong....
So you know our little secret. What does an insignificant creature like you want? What would make you dare threaten a noble?
I was promised a pile of credits to take him back to the Republic.
It's my job.
You mean back to my family, don't you? But I thought....
Altaca's family put a bounty out for him. I'm just here to collect.
Don't look at me.
My family? How can that be? I thought....
The "lord" here is wanted back at home.
His family misses him.
At home? But that means....
You told me I was trapped here! That I would have to forget my family! That this--this charade was the only way!
Inside voice, darling. I may have exaggerated a bit, but hasn't it been nice here? The parties, the late nights, the intrigues and such?
You witch! Keeping me here as your plaything when I could have been home, with my sisters and dear mother.
Ugh, you can be such a whiny pain. It's a wonder you're nobility. Let us make a new deal, bounty hunter.
Make this fast, lady. I've got other things to do.
My time is expensive.
Go on.
No deals. You give me Altaca now.
I don't think so.
Oh, stop testing my patience. The only reason you aren't dead is because I'd rather not cause a scene.
This had better be good, lady.
Fine, make your pitch.
Should've thought of that before you became a Republic noble lover.
Too late for that.
Ouch. I am getting very close to wanting you dead.
My darling... my lovely Altaca. Wouldn't you rather stay here with me than run home to your pathetic Republic family?
What? Of course not! You treat me like a pet, and this planet is disgusting. In fact, I'd rather--
Yes, yes. You've made your tiresome viewpoint clear. Then here is what I propose....
I assume Altaca's family will pay less for just his body. Kill him, show me the slip and I'll compensate you the difference.
Wha--what? You want him to kill me?
You think I'd let you walk away and be someone else's pet? Never.
This keeps getting more disturbing.
She's insane! Please, take me back to my family. It would mean so much to them... to my poor mother.
Tugging on my heartstrings was a mistake. Turns out, I haven't got any.
Like I care. [Kill him]
That was delightful! His expression alone was worth it!
Let me see your job slip... all right, this will even you up. I even put in a bit extra for the show.
Glad to be of service.
You're welcome.
You're a credit to your profession.
I think I got a little Altaca on you.
Sorry about the mess.
I'm sure it will wash out.
I'll leave you to your sick parlor games.
You're completely twisted.
You must find life's little pleasures wherever you can--and wring them dry.
Goodbye, bounty hunter.
I don't kill people unless I have to.
I prefer him alive. [Freeze him]
You've made a very big mistake here today. Now take this thing and leave. Your kind does not belong here.
I'm too good for this place.
You've got that right.
Sure you don't want to get some dinner with me?
[Flirt] I could.
Aw, I thought we were bonding!
We're not friends?
You don't scare me, you pathetic witch.
Stuff it, lady.
Just leave.
Altaca's right, lady--you're way too crazy to live.
Enough. [Kill Lady Dak-Ah]
Wha--what? You want her to kill me?
Making a scene is part of my job description.
Doesn't bother me. [Attack]
Defend me, my love!
What? Are you insane?
Um, excuse me.
